document.heading: Kiowa Tribe Newsletter Publishing Act of 2023
document.text: At a duly called Session of the Legislature of the Kiowa Tribe held this 14th day of January, 2023, the following Resolution and Law were adopted.

recital.text: the Legislature is vested with the authority to pass laws and resolutions pursuant to Article VI, Section 6(a) of the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe; and,

the Kiowa Tribe Legislature serve as the Kiowa Tribe Citizens representatives to ensure that the Tribe's government acts in a transparent and responsible manner in accordance with the Constitution and laws of the Tribe; and,
the Constitution requires to publish certain documents, and to otherwise provide information to the public.
the Kiowa Tribe has established a newsletter, as a useful source of information, about Tribal, historical and current events.
the Kiowa Tribe Newsletter, will publish on a monthly basis by print and electronically for Kiowa Tribal Citizens to review tribal information and current events.

recital.conjunction: NOW THEREFORE IT BE IT RESOLVED;
recital.text: that the Legislature hereby enacts the attached law entitled, "KIOWA TRIBE NEWSLETTER PUBLISHING ACT OF 2023".

procedural-data.text: The foregoing Resolution KL-CY-2023-003 was duly voted upon by the Legislature on January 14, 2023, at a Legislative Regular Session LXIX (69) with a vote of (6)-Yes, (0)-No, (0)-Abstain, and (1)-Absent, pursuant to the authority vested in the Legislature by the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe.

text.b: DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION AND LAW TO THE CHAIRMAN

procedural-data.text: Resolution No. KL-CY-2023-003 was presented to the Chairman of the Kiowa Tribe on the day of January, 2023, pursuant to the Article VI, Section 8(a)(iv) of the Constitution of the Kiowa Tribe, and will become effective after signature by the Chairman or veto override by the Legislature, and as otherwise required by the Constitution.

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as, the "KIOWA TRIBE NEWSLETTER PUBLISHING ACT OF 2023" ("Act").

para.text: The Kiowa Tribe Legislators serve as the Kiowa Tribe Citizens representatives to ensure that the Tribe's government acts in a transparent and responsible manner in accordance with the Constitution and laws of the Tribe.
The Constitution requires the Legislature to publish certain documents, and to otherwise provide information to the members of the Kiowa Tribe;

Citizens of the Tribe live in all areas of the Tribe's Territory and outside the Tribe's Territory, and the use of a newsletters and modern forms of electronic communication to publish and receive information from the Tribe, are the most cost-effective method to comply with the publishing requirements of the Constitution.

section.heading: Purpose.
section.text: The purpose of this Act is to authorize and direct the Public Relations, Media and Outreach Department to publish a newsletter on a monthly basis by print and electronically, on the Tribe's official website, for Kiowa Tribal Citizens, to receive information and current events.
